822710.name: Clash: Mutants Vs Pirates
822710.description:
Clash: Mutants Vs Pirates is a 3rd person hero based MOBA-Shooter.



Vicious space pirates are invading an alternate version of earth where mankind has been turned into ghastly mutants.
It is up to you to pick a side and either protect the earth as a part of its mutated defense force or join the space pirates and mercilessly conquer it.
Dive into the vibrant world of Clash MVP and experience a mix of styles ranging from medieval fantasy to science fiction. Engage in fast-paced action and turn the tables in the ultimate battle for the dominion over planet earth.

Key Features:


Choose between 8 Champions with unique abilities.
Engage your enemies in close combat or in ranged battle - Let them go down in fiery explosions or mow them down with heavy weaponry.

  • Unleash mighty special abilities and turn the tides of the battle.
  • Control minions and use them to fight for you.
  • Enhance your fighting skills with a variety of items.
  • Gain experience with each battle and level up to unlock special rewards
  • You can use machine guns, or you can deploy some tower defenses.
  • Queue up solo, with friends, or create custom matches of 3v3, 4v4, or 5v5.

The game introduces the one-of-a-kind

The Kinvader mode:



In this tactical PvP battle mode, each team tries to invade the enemy base with the help of their mightiest ally- the Kinvader.
Working to capture strategic points on the map, each team will attempt to help their Kinvader move forward while also thwarting the advances of the enemy team.
The team that manages to defend their own Kinvader while defeating the opposition and invading their base will secure victory.
